title: Black Box Testing
subject: Software Engineering
theory:
Testing without seeing Code. Focus on I/O. 
Techniques: 
1. **Equivalence Partitioning**: Divide input into valid/invalid groups. 
2. **Boundary Value Analysis (BVA)**: Test edges (e.g., if range 1-100, test 0, 1, 100, 101).

interview_questions.question: Why BVA?
interview_questions.answer: Most bugs hide at boundaries of input domains.
